text: Aur main tumse nahin kehta ke mere paas Allah ke khazane hain, na yeh kehte hoon ke main gaib ka ilm rakhta hoon, na yeh mera dawa hai ke main farishta hoon aur yeh bhi main nahin keh sakta ke jin logon ko tumhari aankhein hikarat se dekhti hain unhein Allah ne koi bhalayi nahin di. Unke nafs ka haal Allah hi behtar jaanta hai. Agar main aisa kahoon to zalim hongaâ€
